name: Arcade Ascension
description:
INTRODUCTION

Hello and welcome to my game. This is a passion project of mine which I started not too long ago.

Enjoy the game demo and let me know your thoughts. Constructive criticism is extremely valuable to me so if you have any gripes or annoyances let me know.

If you're interested in following this game's development then make sure to subscribe to my youtube channel as I will be posting dev logs and more.

FEATURES

  • Pulsating Combat! - Featuring challenging patterns with various ways of dodging.

Blood Pumping Mechanics - Mechanics designed to make your heart skip a beat.

Responsive Dodges - Be hit only when you are supposed to. Something I value extremely, is accurately displayed hitboxes & hit registration.

COMING SOON

(Not guaranteed all of these will be in the next update but its the goal. Feedback may also alter the list)

- 2 More Mechanics (1 is almost complete already)

- Quest Completion / Boss Defeated SFX.

- Quest Completion / Boss Defeated UI.

GENERAL INFO

Disclaimer: Currently, the game is in a very very early stage hence why I put it as a prototype for the time being 👍

The goal of this prototype: To Get feedback and showcase the game.

Youtube Channel: @IsValid

If you have suggestions / wish for more info about the game or just wish to speak to me directly, join the discord.

Discord: @Discord

Thanks for playing!
